entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Qu'Appelle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Indian Head AAFC 8:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -25.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -28.7°C
Wind: W 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
